Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Recombinant Viral Vaccine/Vaccinia Vaccine/Recombinant Vaccinia Prostate-Specific Antigen Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: PSA Vaccinia (chick embryo dermo cell-produced) THERION
Prostate Specific Antigen Expressing Vaccinia Virus Vaccine
Record.Description: A vaccine consisting of recombinant vaccinia virus encoding prostate specific antigen (PSA). Vaccination with recombinant vaccinia prostate-specific antigen vaccine stimulates the host immune system to mount a cytotoxic T-cell response against tumor cells expressing PSA.
